titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> "balance due" = all crossed out, # is unreadable <*> Sept 23 = "Maudva"? "Mandva"? <*> Oct 3 = "Faust"? s2: <*> Nov 23 = "son"? "soo"? s4: <*> Feb 17 = crossed out too much, return date illegible <*> Feb 27 = return date crossed out <*> Feb 13 = "Trent"? s5: <*> May 15 = "Flotz"? s7: <*> address = "Azaln"? <*> illegible notation next to address
